settings.text: Echo Master League is a community focused competitive league around Echo Arena and Combat. Echo was released by Ready at Dawn in 2017, and quickly established itself as the premier zero-gravity virtual reality sports game out there. We at EML are here to support those who love the game.
Make sure everything here is correct before starting your stream
